item.description:
Dear Members,

Thanks to all of you that attended last Sunday's meet.  It was truly delightful to see the wide variety of small and tiny dogs playing together without much of any conflict.  There were quite a few of us there, too, so thanks to everyone for coming!

We will meet on May 15th from 1-4pm at Holliston Meadows, 140 Summer Street, Holliston, MA (508) 429 8899.  Please bring a folding chair or two with you if you can, and/or a food or beverage to share.  The chairs brought last time allowed us all to sit down in a circle around the room, which is very comfortable.

The cost is $5 per group or household.

 

See you there!

 

Small dog best,

Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: BOSTON MALTESE & TINY DOG MEET, May 15, Sunday, 1-4pm Holliston Meadows,$5
